parameters.name: attachResourceType
parameters.description:
The types of attachment points supported by the policy. Valid values: 

- HttpApi
- Operation
- GatewayRoute
- GatewayService
- GatewayServicePort
- Domain
- Gateway

parameters.name: withAttachments
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return attachment information.

parameters.name: withSystemPolicy
parameters.description: Specifies whether it is a system policy.
